name: GameJam: Farmyard Drift
description:
The Fat and the Fluffy: Farmyard Drift

On a farm where the only law is SPEED the one way to earn respect is on the POWERDRIFT circuit, where one wrong move spells DISASTER. 

Master your sheep and drift your way around the farmyard, avoiding the mint-sauce wannabes and walls!

Complete inane tasks to unlock progressively more deranged lamb racers!

Cool musics provided by @BrothaDom!

Don't want to download? (Unity) Web version available at http://www.pixelsyntax.com/farmyarddrift
